ch-integrity-1: Do one task today exactly as you promised, even if it's inconvenient.
ch-integrity-2: Be honest in a situation where it would be easier not to be.
ch-integrity-3: Admit a small mistake quickly and without excuses.
ch-integrity-4: Follow through on a commitment you've been avoiding.
ch-integrity-5: Make a decision today based on principles, not comfort.
ch-compassion-1: Offer help to someone without being asked.
ch-compassion-2: Respond gently to someone who seems stressed or frustrated.
ch-compassion-3: Give someone the benefit of the doubt.
ch-compassion-4: Do one small act of kindness anonymously.
ch-compassion-5: Listen to someone fully without interrupting.
ch-curiosity-1: Ask three genuine questions in conversations today.
ch-curiosity-2: Explore a topic you know nothing about for 10 minutes.
ch-curiosity-3: Try a new route, food, or small experience.
ch-curiosity-4: Read or watch something outside your usual interests.
ch-curiosity-5: Challenge one assumption you normally take for granted.
ch-courage-1: Do one thing you've been avoiding because it feels uncomfortable.
ch-courage-2: Speak up once today when you normally stay quiet.
ch-courage-4: Start a task you've been procrastinating on.
ch-courage-5: Say no to something that drains you.
ch-discipline-1: Stick to one small habit today without exception.
ch-discipline-2: Set a timer and work uninterrupted for 20 minutes.
ch-discipline-3: Avoid one impulse behaviour such as snacking or scrolling.
ch-discipline-5: Plan your next day before going to bed.
ch-gratitude-1: Write down three things you appreciate right now.
ch-gratitude-2: Thank someone directly for something they did.
ch-gratitude-3: Notice one small positive moment and pause to feel it.
ch-gratitude-4: Express appreciation to someone you usually overlook.
ch-gratitude-5: Reframe one annoyance by finding something good in it.
ch-empathy-1: Reflect on how someone else might be feeling before responding.
ch-empathy-2: Validate someone's emotions without trying to fix them.
ch-empathy-3: Ask someone how their day is going and listen fully.
ch-empathy-4: Imagine yourself in another person's situation for one minute.
ch-empathy-5: Respond with patience when someone is slow or confused.
ch-creativity-1: Spend 10 minutes brainstorming ideas with no judgment.
ch-creativity-2: Create something small: a doodle, note, photo, or sketch.
ch-creativity-3: Try solving a problem in a new way.
ch-creativity-4: Rearrange or redesign a small part of your environment.
ch-creativity-5: Combine two unrelated ideas into something new.
ch-humility-1: Acknowledge when someone else has a better idea.
ch-humility-2: Ask for feedback on something you're working on.
ch-humility-3: Admit when you don't know something.
ch-humility-4: Let someone else take the lead.
ch-humility-5: Appreciate someone's strengths without comparing yourself.
ch-responsibility-1: Take ownership of one task you've been avoiding.
ch-responsibility-2: Fix something small you normally ignore.
ch-responsibility-3: Keep your word on one commitment today.
ch-responsibility-4: Clean or organise a space you use.
ch-responsibility-5: Make a decision without blaming circumstances.
ch-authenticity-1: Share one honest thought or feeling with someone you trust.
ch-authenticity-2: Make a choice today based on what you want, not expectations.
ch-authenticity-3: Wear or do something that expresses your true self.
ch-authenticity-4: Say yes only when you genuinely mean it.
ch-authenticity-5: Notice when you're pretending and shift back to honesty.
ch-patience-1: Pause for 5 seconds before responding in a tense moment.
ch-patience-2: Let someone finish speaking without interrupting.
ch-patience-3: Choose the slowest queue and stay calm.
ch-patience-5: Do a task slowly and mindfully on purpose.
ch-kindness-2: Do something thoughtful for someone close to you.
ch-kindness-3: Hold the door or help someone physically.
ch-kindness-4: Send a kind message to someone you haven't spoken to recently.
ch-kindness-5: Treat yourself kindly in one moment of stress.
ch-growth-mindset-1: Try something new even if you might fail.
ch-growth-mindset-2: Reframe a mistake as a learning opportunity.
ch-growth-mindset-3: Ask for help or guidance on something challenging.
ch-balance-2: Stop working at a set time today.
ch-balance-3: Do one activity purely for enjoyment.
ch-balance-4: Say no to something that overloads your schedule.
ch-balance-5: Spend time outdoors or away from screens.
ch-respect-1: Speak to everyone today with equal courtesy.
ch-respect-2: Respect someone's time by being punctual.
ch-respect-3: Let someone have their opinion without arguing.
ch-perseverance-1: Stick with a task for 10 more minutes when you want to quit.
ch-perseverance-2: Finish something you started earlier in the week.
ch-perseverance-4: Review your long-term goals and take one step toward them.
ch-perseverance-5: Keep a promise to yourself even if motivation is low.
ch-mindfulness-1: Take three slow breaths before starting a task.
ch-mindfulness-2: Eat one meal or snack without distractions.
ch-mindfulness-3: Notice five things around you using your senses.
ch-mindfulness-5: Catch your mind wandering and gently return to the present.
ch-generosity-1: Give something small: time, attention, or help.
ch-generosity-2: Share a resource or recommendation with someone.
ch-generosity-3: Offer support without expecting anything back.
ch-generosity-4: Donate an item you no longer need.
ch-self-awareness-1: Notice one emotional trigger and name the feeling.
ch-self-awareness-2: Reflect on why you reacted strongly to something.
ch-self-awareness-3: Journal for 5 minutes about your current state.
ch-self-awareness-4: Observe your thoughts without judging them.
ch-self-awareness-5: Identify one need you've been ignoring.
